attributes.action: Abolish the current Police Force and replace them with a new Royal Police Force with a more flamboyant uniform and new shiny helmets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current police force is fatally flawed and is in need of replacing.

A new Royal Police Force with more flamboyant uniform and new shiny helmets should be started in order to gain more respect from the public.

Any members of the new Royal Police Force should be elected annually by the public locally and governed by the current head of the Royal Family. 

No current police officer may join the new force as this will only transfer the poor management of the current force to the new royal force.

The uniforms should be Royal Red and the helmets shiny.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
